price: 18 Seuls sont dignes de fréquenter les mosquées ceux qui croient en Allah et au Jour dernier, accomplissent la prière, s’acquittent de l’aumône et ne craignent qu’Allah. Voilà ceux qui suivent le droit chemin.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَعۡمُرُ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَأَقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَى ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَلَمۡ يَخۡشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ فَعَسَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَن يَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innamā yaʿmuru masājida al-lahi man āmana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-aqāma al-ṣalata waātā al-zakata walam yakhsha illā al-laha faʿasā ulāika an yakūnū mina al-muh'tadīna
